snippet: Previewing the Champions League quarterfinal matchups for April 3 and 4, when Bayern Munich and Real Madrid will try to protect leads forged in the first leg, and Barcelona will try to solve Milan's defense.
abstract: Previewing the Champions League quarterfinal matchups for April 3 and 4, when Bayern Munich and Real Madrid will try to protect leads forged in the first leg, and Barcelona will try to solve Milan's defense.

headline.main: Champions League Preview: Quarterfinal Second Legs
